node.title: The Cutting Edge: Getting Back to Our Calling
node.description:
In this seminar we will look at how most lifestyle diseases can be reversed through Biblical health principles. We will also discuss how medical professionals around the world are changing lives in their communities physically and spiritually and how we can seek to best impact our region.

 

Objectives:

Identify the Biblical components of a physician’s calling: Teaching and Healing

Review scientific evidence for treating or reversing several lifestyle diseases with diet and lifestyle including: Heart disease, Diabetes, Depression

Discuss practical ways to get back to our calling of teaching, training, and healing.

Demonstrate examples of creative ways health professionals can maximize the impact of their healing work.
